summary: Full redesign verification testing. All backend tests passed (7/7). New design elements verified: glass nav with text links, gradient hero, ticker with // prefix, LIVE MARKET SIGNALS ACTIVE pill, blue CTAs, centered login/register cards, password strength indicator. Auth flows (register newtest456, login debugtest123) work end-to-end. Post-login authenticated nav shows all 8 links (Profile, Tasks, My Score, My Plan, Proof Vault, Interview AI, Skill Gap, Market Mission).

issues: Nav wraps to 2 rows on 1920px when logged in (8 links + username + Light/Logout row below). Minor layout issue but not blocking.

critical_code_review_comments: Login/Register form inputs missing type='text' on username field and type='submit' on buttons - minor HTML semantics issue but functional
Authenticated nav overflows to 2 rows due to 8 nav links - consider horizontal scroll or collapsible menu for narrow viewports

success_rate.frontend: 95% (all core flows working, minor nav layout issue)

context_for_next_testing_agent: App uses X-Auth-Token header for auth (not Bearer). Backend test at /app/backend/tests/test_market_ready.py. Login/Register buttons use text 'Sign In'/'Create Account' (no type=submit). Inputs have no name/type attributes. Use inputs[0].fill() approach for forms. All redesign features verified working.
rca_of_issues: Login username input has no type attribute (defaults to text - functional) and no name attribute. Submit buttons lack type=submit. These don't break functionality but fail strict selector tests.
